name: Entertainment Robot aibo by Sony
description: Soneium proudly presents an exclusive SBT featuring aibo - the world's first entertainment robot by Sony. For over 25 years, aibo has stood as a symbol of innovation and emotional connection, combining advanced AI with a unique personality that evolves alongside its owner. Now, aibo's legacy enters Web3 through this officially licensed SBT on Soneium, a next-generation blockchain developed by Sony Block Solutions Labs. This milestone release offers collectors a way to own and engage with a piece of Sony's masterpiece.
